actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Domestic and Foreign Marketing.
Committee on Agriculture. Provisions of measure incorporated into measure S. 1729 ordered to be reported.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Domestic and Foreign Marketing and Product Promotion

official_title: A bill to provide for a nationally coordinated program of research, promotion, and consumer information regarding limes that is designed to expand domestic and foreign markets for limes, and for other purposes.
short_title: Fresh Lime Research, Promotion, and Consumer Information Act

summary.text: Fresh Lime Research, Promotion, and Consumer Information Act - Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to issue lime research, promotion, and consumer information orders, including orders for the creation of a Lime Board and orders imposing assessments with regard to the production and importation of fresh limes. Provides for administrative and judicial review of an order and judicial enforcement of an order. Provides for referenda among lime producers, handlers, and importers regarding orders.

titles.title: Fresh Lime Research, Promotion, and Consumer Information Act

A bill to provide for a nationally coordinated program of research, promotion, and consumer information regarding limes that is designed to expand domestic and foreign markets for limes, and for other purposes.
